mapper.insert: insert into item(itemNum, itemName, itemMainType, itemSubType, itemPrice, itemDiscount, itemContent, itemImage1, itemImage2, itemImage3, itemImage4, detailImage, itemHitcount,itemStock, itemState, todaydeal, itemColor, itemSize) values (#{itemNum}, #{itemName}, #{itemMainType}, #{itemSubType}, #{itemPrice}, #{itemDiscount}, #{itemContent}, #{itemImage1}, #{itemImage2}, #{itemImage3}, #{itemImage4}, #{detailImage}, 0,#{itemStock}, #{itemState}, #{todaydeal}, #{itemColor}, #{itemSize})

insert into item(itemNum, itemName, itemMainType, itemSubType, itemPrice, itemDiscount, itemContent, itemImage1, itemImage2, itemImage3, itemImage4, detailImage, itemHitcount, itemStock, itemState, todaydeal, itemColor, itemSize) values (#{itemNum}, #{itemName}, #{itemMainType}, #{itemSubType}, #{itemPrice}, #{itemDiscount}, #{itemContent}, #{image1}, #{image2}, #{image3}, #{image4}, #{image5}, #{itemHitcount}, #{itemStock}, #{itemState}, #{todaydeal}, #{itemColor}, #{itemSize})
insert into file_store(no, original_file_name, uuid_file_name, file_path, file_extension, reg_dt) values (#{no},#{original_file_name},#{uuid_file_name}, #{file_path}, #{file_extension}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: select nvl(count(*),0) from item where ${searchKey} like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
mapper.update: update item set itemHitcount=itemHitcount+1 where itemNum=#{itemNum}
mapper.select: select itemNum, itemName, itemMainType, itemSubType, itemPrice, itemDiscount, itemContent, (select fs.UUID_FILE_NAME||'.'||fs.FILE_EXTENSION from file_store fs where fs.no = item.itemImage1 ) as itemImage1, (select fs.UUID_FILE_NAME||'.'||fs.FILE_EXTENSION from file_store fs where fs.no = item.itemImage2 ) as itemImage2, (select fs.UUID_FILE_NAME||'.'||fs.FILE_EXTENSION from file_store fs where fs.no = item.itemImage3 ) as itemImage3, (select fs.UUID_FILE_NAME||'.'||fs.FILE_EXTENSION from file_store fs where fs.no = item.itemImage4 ) as itemImage4, (select fs.UUID_FILE_NAME||'.'||fs.FILE_EXTENSION from file_store fs where fs.no = item.detailImage ) as detailImage, itemHitcount, itemStock, itemState, todaydeal, itemColor, itemSize from item where itemNum=#{itemNum}
